title: Visualizing 500,000 Subscribers
description: Celebrating the 500,000 subscribers milestone, I create a map visualization of Coding Train subscriber locations around the world!

timestamps.title: Describe map types: static and tile
Overlay the map on a canvas
Draw a circle with a fixed position
Draw a circle considering longitude and latitude
Reference a dataset with the coordinates for the world's countries
Associate YouTube data by country ID
Draw a circle with the coordinates
Update the diameter of the circles
Find the minimum and maximum number of subscribers
Map diameter considering the minimum and maximum values
Update scale according to the zoom value

codeExamples.title: Visualizing 500,000 Subscribers
codeExamples.description: This sketch creates a map visualization for the location of subscribers to the Coding Train YouTube channel.
